Management

Class GlobalParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • Management.GlobalParameters

  • public class GlobalParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains the global parameters for controlling the QUSat system Created by ohlbach on 12.10.2018.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.io.File directory 
      java.lang.String home 
      private java.lang.String logFile
      just for the toString method
      java.io.PrintStream logstream
      for printing information about the working of the system
      Monitor monitor
      for monitoring the actions of the solvers
      int parallel
      number of parallel threads for solving several problems. 0 (default) means sequential processing.
      java.lang.String resultFile 
      java.lang.String statisticsCSVFile 
      boolean statisticsText 
      java.lang.String statisticsTextFile
      for printing the results of the solvers
      ProblemSupervisor supervisor
      supervises the solution of the problem
